title: Rational suicide
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Euthanasia

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Right to die
description: Episode of Series "60 Minutes". To some perfectly rational people afflicted with pain and incurable disease, rational suicide has become a real and plausible option. Others believe that you don't have to kill the patient to kill the pain. The film examines both sides of the argument, including an interview with a man who assisted his terminally ill wife in taking her own life.
